text: atarkavarkal (ivarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkalitam vanta (iraivanutaiya) tutarkal telivana attatcikalutan unkalitam varavillaiya?'' Enru ketparkal. Atarku ivarkal ‘‘am! Meytan (vantarkal)'' enru kuruvarkal. Atarkavarkal, ‘‘avvarayin, (nankal iraivanitam ketpatarkillai.) Ninkale kettukkollunkal'' enru kurivituvarkal. Innirakarippavarkalin pirarttanai oru payanum alikkatu
